original_text: So they took him out of his chariot, put him in his other chariot and brought him to Jerusalem, where he died. He was buried in the tombs of his ancestors, and all Judah and Jerusalem mourned for him.
korean_text: 그 부하들이 그를 병거에서 내리게 하고 그의 버금 병거에 태워 예루살렘에 이른 후에 그가 죽으니 그의 조상들의 묘실에 장사되니라 온 유다와 예루살렘 사람들이 요시야를 슬퍼하고

sentences.original_text: So they took him out of his chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그를 그의 전차에서 내렸다

sentences.original_text: put him in his other chariot
He was buried in the tombs of his ancestors
and all Judah and Jerusalem mourned for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 유다와 예루살렘 사람들이 그를 위해 애도했다
